page.title: 11GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: { DRAINS}Mostly played by girls.You need two three or four people each with a marble and a drain inspection cover.The marbles are placed on the outside corners of the cover and one person is chosen to go first.Each person tries with one flick to roll her marble into the central marking of the cover.If none succeed each has a second go until one person's marble reaches that area.That person then has a go at the other people's marbles.If they too reach the central area that person keeps them.If those don't go in you take it inturns with the remaining marbles.
